segments.text: Oh wow, this scene catches me off guard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying a plate, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But behind her, the sink's turned into a fountain.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pouring over, pooling at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so calm, like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are raiding the cookie jar on the sly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's up on the stool, grabbing a handful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tipping, thoughâ€”hold on tight, kid!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's all hazards and secrets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool holds and someone turns off the tap.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a lively, chaotic moment captured here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Can't look away from the impending doom.
segments.speaker: PAR
